sentences: Michel Herr (born 16 February 1949 in Brussels) is a Belgian jazz pianist, composer and arranger.
section: N/A

sentences: In addition to releasing jazz albums, composing for jazz ensembles and touring widely as a performing musician, he has also composed scores for films.
section: N/A

sentences: As a bandleader he founded several bands: Solis Lacus, Michel Herr European Quintet, Michel Herr & Unexpected Encounters.
section: N/A

sentences: He is also a music producer.
section: N/A

sentences: In 2020 he was awarded the Prix Sabam for Culture - Compositeur de Jazz 2019 for his album Positive / Music for sextet and string quartet (Igloo Records, 2019).
section: N/A
